description: Vladimir Tarasenko scored at 3:24 of overtime to lift the St. Louis Blues to a 4-3 victory over the Dallas Stars on Monday night.

title: Hickey's OT goal helps Isles stay strong at home vs Flames
description: Thomas Hickey scored 1:53 into overtime, helping the New York Islanders again find their footing at home with a 2-1 win over the Calgary Flames on Monday night.

title: Stolarz makes 29 saves, Flyers beat Flames 5-3
description: Anthony Stolarz made 29 saves for his first NHL victory in the Philadelphia Flyers' 5-3 win over the Calgary Flames on Sunday night.

title: Florida Panthers announce the firing of coach Gerard Gallant
description: Gerard Gallant's firing has been announced by the Florida Panthers, one day after the 2015-16 coach of the year finalist was dismissed in a somewhat surprising move.

title: AP Source: Panthers fire coach Gerard Gallant
description: Gerard Gallant was a coach of the year finalist last season after guiding the Florida Panthers to a division title and the best regular season in franchise history.

title: Anderson makes 32 saves, Senators beat Rangers 2-0
description: Despite playing less than 24 hours before, Craig Anderson wanted to be in net when the Ottawa Senators took on the New York Rangers at Madison Square Garden.

title: Hayes scores as Bruins beat Lightning 4-1
description: Jimmy Hayes capped Boston's three-goal second period with his first of the season, Tuukka Rask stopped 30 shots and the Bruins snapped a three-game losing streak by beating the Tampa Bay Lightning 4-1 on Sunday.

title: McGinn breaks late tie, Coyotes beat Oilers 2-1
description: Jamie McGinn broke a tie with 3:44 left and Mike Smith made 41 saves in the Arizona Coyotes' 2-1 victory over the Edmonton Oilers on Sunday.

title: Jets blank Predators 3-0
description: Connor Hellebuyck made 42 saves and Drew Stafford scored his first goal of the season and the Winnipeg Jets ended a five-game losing streak with a 3-0 victory over the Nashville Predators on Sunday.

title: Getzlaf helps Ducks top Sharks 3-2
description: Ryan Getzlaf had a goal and an assist, and the Anaheim Ducks snapped a three-game skid with a 3-2 victory over the San Jose Sharks on Saturday night.

title: Carter's OT goal puts Kings past Hawks 2-1, 5th straight win
description: Jeff Carter scored his 10th goal of the season 1:06 into overtime, and the Los Angeles Kings beat the Chicago Blackhawks 2-1 on Saturday night for their season-best fifth consecutive victory.

title: Jacob Markstrom has 32 saves as Canucks beat Avs 3-2
description: Jacob Markstrom had 32 saves and made three consecutive stops in a shootout, helping the Vancouver Canucks beat the Colorado Avalanche 3-2 on Saturday night.

title: Schwartz, Blues beat Wild 4-3 in shootout
description: Jaden Schwartz had two goals in the third period, David Perron scored the only goal in a shootout and the St. Louis Blues beat the Minnesota Wild 4-3 on Saturday night.

title: Marner, Matthew helps Maple Leafs beat Capitals 4-2
description: The play didn't actually result in a goal in Toronto's 4-2 victory over Washington, but came pretty close, another demonstration of the ease with which the NHL seems to be coming to Maple Leafs rookie Mitch Marner.

title: Turris scores 10th goal, Senators beat Hurricanes 2-1
description: The Ottawa Senators found another way to win a close game — at the Carolina Hurricanes' expense.

title: Galchenyuk's OT goal gives Canadiens 2-1 win over Wings
description: The Montreal Canadiens found a way — again.

title: Crosby ties it late, Penguins top Devils in shootout 4-3
description: As the bodies piled up in front of the New Jersey net with the clock ticking toward zero and the Pittsburgh Penguins trailing by a goal, Sidney Crosby watched patiently off to the side.

title: Barkov nets winner, Panthers over Blue Jackets 2-1 in SO
description: When the Florida Panthers go to a shootout, look out for Aleksander Barkov.

title: Coyotes rally, beat Oilers 3-2 in shootout
description: Radim Vrbata and Oliver Ekman-Larsson scored in a shootout to give the Arizona Coyotes a 3-2 comeback victory over the Pacific Division-leading Edmonton Oilers on Friday night.

title: Lindell scores 1st goal, adds assist, Stars beat Canucks 2-1
description: Esa Lindell scored his first NHL goal and had an assist to help the Dallas Stars beat the Vancouver Canucks 2-1 on Friday night.

title: Chad Johnson makes 35 saves, Flames beat Bruins 2-1
description: Chad Johnson made 35 saves and Alex Chiasson broke a tie at 7:05 of the third period in Calgary Flames' 2-1 victory over the Boston Bruins on Friday night.

title: Mike Green scores in OT, Red Wings beat Devils 5-4
description: Mike Green and the struggling Detroit Red Wings ended a scoring slump, with a little help from Frans Nielsen.

title: Blue Jackets skate past Lightning 5-3
description: The Columbus Blue Jackets started and finished fast against the Tampa Bay Lightning.

title: Kane paces Chicago past Anaheim 3-2 in Black Friday rivalry
description: Patrick Kane had a goal and an assist, and the Chicago Blackhawks hung on to beat the Anaheim Ducks 3-2 for their fifth consecutive win in the clubs' Black Friday rivalry game.

title: Marleau's late goal leads Sharks past Islanders 3-2
description: Patrick Marleau scored with 22.5 seconds left and the San Jose Sharks rebounded after allowing the tying goal in the closing minute to win their third straight game, 3-2 over the New York Islanders on Friday.

title: Coyle's pair of goals in 1st spark Wild in 6-2 win over Pens
description: Charlie Coyle scored twice in the first period to set the tone as Minnesota matched its season high for goals, and the Wild scored three times on the power play on their way to a 6-2 rout of the Pittsburgh Penguins on Friday.

title: Puempel, Lundqvist lead Rangers past Flyers
description: Matt Puempel scored in his first game with the Rangers, and Henrik Lundqvist made 40 saves to help New York defeat the Philadelphia Flyers 3-2 on Friday.

title: Wideman, Turris score in third, Senators beat Bruins 3-1
description: Chris Wideman and Kyle Turris scored in the third period to help the Ottawa Senators beat the Boston Bruins 3-1 on Thursday night.

title: Max Pacioretty breaks tie, Canadiens beat Hurricanes 2-1
description: Max Pacioretty broke a tie 14 seconds into the third period and the Montreal Canadiens beat Carolina 2-1 on Thursday night to end the Hurricanes' winning streak at five games.

title: McPhee's Caps tenure no hint to NHL on Vegas expansion draft
description: Now that they have a name, the Vegas Golden Knights have to put a team on the ice.

title: Forbort breaks tie, Kings top Islanders 4-2 for 4th straight
description: Derek Forbort scored the go-ahead goal with 2:28 remaining, Peter Budaj stopped 22 shots and the Los Angeles Kings defeated the New York Islanders 4-2 on Wednesday night for their fourth consecutive win.

title: McDavid has 3 points in 3rd as Oilers beat Avalanche 6-3
description: Connor McDavid extended his scoring surge with a goal and two assists in the third period, Milan Lucic had four points and the Edmonton Oilers beat the Colorado Avalanche 6-3 on Wednesday night.

title: Canucks roll past Coyotes with 3-goal second period
description: Bo Horvat and Sven Baertschi each had a goal and two assists, helping the Vancouver Canucks beat the Arizona Coyotes 4-1 on Wednesday night.

title: Jones, Ward lead Sharks to over Blackhawks 2-1
description: Logan Couture and Joel Ward scored in the first period and the San Jose Sharks gave the Chicago Blackhawks their second straight loss with a 2-1 victory on Wednesday night.

title: Killorn and Callahan score in 3rd, Lightning beat Flyers 4-2
description: Alex Killorn and Ryan Callahan scored 12 seconds apart in the third period, and the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Philadelphia Flyers 4-2 on Wednesday night.

title: Cammalleri has 4 points in return, Devils edge Leafs in SO
description: After taking care of his family and seriously ill daughter for almost two weeks, Mike Cammalleri returned to the New Jersey Devils and took care of them, too.

title: Ovechkin's 16th hat trick sends Caps to 4-3 win over Blues
description: Alex Ovechkin stretched out his arms in celebration, teammates mobbed him along the boards and jubilant fans launched their hats onto the ice.

title: Red Wings end skid with 2-1 shootout win over Sabres
description: Detroit Red Wings forward Thomas Vanek heard the boos and knew exactly what move he would use in his shootout attempt.

title: Forsberg, Rinne lead Predators past Stars, 5-2
description: Pekka Rinne doesn't want November to end.

title: Johnson gets another shutout, Flames beat Jackets 2-0
description: Journeyman goalie Chad Johnson, in his first season with Calgary, is beginning to show he can be a source of stability for the up-and-down Flames.

title: Dubnyk makes 15 saves, Wild beat road-weary Jets 3-1
description: Devan Dubnyk has been one of the best goalies in the NHL lately.

title: Crosby, Penguins pull away from Rangers in 6-1 rout
description: Sidney Crosby got angry, and then the Pittsburgh Penguins got even in a big way against the division-leading New York Rangers.

title: Leddy ends 14-round shootout, Islanders beat Ducks
description: Nick Leddy scored the winner in a marathon 14-round shootout, lifting the New York Islanders over the Anaheim Ducks 3-2 on Tuesday night.

title: Stalberg scores SHG, Canes top Leafs for 5th straight win
description: Viktor Stalberg got a head start, pulled away from the defenders and buried his short-handed breakaway try.

title: Stone, Karlsson score late to lift Sens over Canadiens 4-3
description: Mark Stone and Erik Karlsson scored 2:24 apart in the third period, helping Ottawa Senators rally to beat the Montreal Canadiens 4-3 on Tuesday night.

title: Allen stops 39 for Blues in 4-2 win at Boston
description: The St. Louis Blues turned around a listless start by getting gritty in the second period.

title: Mason, Simmonds lead Flyers over Panthers 3-1
description: Wayne Simmonds and the Philadelphia Flyers played a strong game in front of Steve Mason, and the goaltender was there when needed.

title: Jones, early goals help Sharks beat Devils 4-0
description: Martin Jones made 26 saves, Chris Tierney and Patrick Marleau each scored early and the San Jose Sharks sent the New Jersey Devils to their third straight loss Monday night with a 4-0 victory.

title: Benn wrists in goal in OT, Stars beat Wild 3-2
description: Jamie Benn flicked in a goal 1:23 into overtime, lifting the Dallas Stars over the Minnesota Wild 3-2 on Monday night.

title: Draisaitl, Talbot help Oilers thump Blackhawks 5-0
description: Leon Draisaitl scored twice and Cam Talbot made 31 saves for his third shutout of the season, helping the Edmonton Oilers beat the Western Conference-leading Chicago Blackhawks 5-0 on Monday night.

title: Miller helps Rangers rally past Penguins, 5-2
description: The New York Rangers aren't about to let the loss of two top forwards derail their hot start.

title: Sabres score 3 power-play goals in 4-2 win over Flames
description: The Buffalo Sabres knew they had a prime opportunity to bust out of their goal-scoring slump and did just that in a 4-2 win over the Calgary Flames on Monday night.

title: Duchene's OT goal leads Avalanche over Blue Jackets 3-2
description: Matt Duchene came back just in time for the Colorado Avalanche.

title: Subban, Rinne lead Predators over Lightning 3-1
description: Pekka Rinne is having a remarkable month for the Nashville Predators.

title: Trochek, Barkov score in SO; Panthers beat Rangers 3-2
description: Vincent Trocheck and Aleksander Barkov scored in the shootout to lift the Florida Panthers over the New York Rangers 3-2 on Sunday night.

title: NHL puts 'John Scott Rule' in place for All-Star fan voting
description: The NHL is taking steps to avoid another John Scott situation at the All-Star Game.

title: Backlund breaks tie in 3rd period, Flames beat Red Wings 3-2
description: Mikael Backlund scored the tiebreaking goal with 7:46 left in the third period to give the Calgary Flames a 3-2 victory over the slumping Detroit Red Wings on Sunday night.
